code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Rating(_ref){let{id,rating}=_ref;const[stars,setStars]=useState(0);const submitRating=async()=>{if(stars===0)return;await axios.post("https://hyderabad-phonebook.onrender.com/api/services/rate/".concat(id),{rating:stars});alert('Thanks for rating!');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rating-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Current Rating: ",rating?rating.toFixed(1):'No rating yet']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setStars(Number(e.target.value)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:0,children:"Rate"}),[1,2,3,4,5].map(n=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:n,children:[n," Star"]},n))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitRating,children:"Submit"})]});}export default Rating;
